articles.author: Steve Hanley
articles.title: If AMOC Runs Amok, Life In The US & Europe Will Change Dramatically - CleanTechnica
articles.description: AMOC, which includes the Gulf Stream, controls the climate in much of the northern hemisphere. What if it stops flowing?
articles.content:
